Title: Fortress
Writer: Troy Neighbors (story), Steven Feinberg (story), Troy Neighbors (screenplay), Steven Feinberg (screenplay), David Venable (screenplay), Terry Curtis Fox (screenplay)
Actors: Christopher Lambert, Kurtwood Smith, Loryn Locklin, Clifton Collins Jr.
Plot: In a future, private underground prison/Fortress, the inmates are computer controlled with CCTV, dream readers and devices that can cause pain or death. John and his illegally pregnant wife are inside but want to escape before birth.
